library(plotly)

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
dept_hour_df = instacart |> 
  group_by(department, order_hour_of_day) |> 
  filter(!is.na(department) & !is.na(order_hour_of_day)) |> 
  summarize(total_orders = n())

dept_hour_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = order_hour_of_day, y = total_orders, color = department)) +
  geom_line(size = 1, alpha = 0.8) +
  labs(
   title = "Orders by Hour of Day across Departments",
    x = "Hour of Day",
    y = "Number of Orders",
    color = "Department"
  )
```
